parameters.definition: Time to cross street segment going west, for given street n and segment w
Time to cross street segment going north, for given street n and segment w

description: Determine the optimal path the delivery person should take to ensure the package is delivered in the least amount of time. The path is constrained by the number of east-west streets, \param{N}, and the number of north-south streets, \param{W}. Each east-west street segment \param{WestTime} and each north-south street segment \param{NorthTime} takes a certain amount of time to cross.
